channel.title: CVE Feed for notepad-plus-plus -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-32168|2024-09-16T18:23:31.618Z -- notepad-plus-plus -- notepad-plus-plus
item.description: Notepad++ versions 8.4.1 and before are vulnerable to DLL hijacking where an attacker can replace the vulnerable dll (UxTheme.dll) with his own dll and run arbitrary code in the context of Notepad++.
